html:
2026-0050
2026-01-30JUSContraventions ActRegulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations (Tobacco and Vaping Products Act) Regulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations (Tobacco and Vaping Products Act) in order to (1) increase the fine amounts for seven offenses already listed in the schedule of the Contraventions Regulation; and (2) update certain existing short-form descriptions for the contravention to ensure they remain accurate following amendments to the Act to include the notion of “vaping product.”Registration: SOR/2026-0011 Publication Date: 2026-02-11
subject: Regulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations (Tobacco and Vaping Products Act)
precis: Regulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations (Tobacco and Vaping Products Act) in order to (1) increase the fine amounts for seven offenses already listed in the schedule of the Contraventions Regulation; and (2) update certain existing short-form descriptions for the contravention to ensure they remain accurate following amendments to the Act to include the notion of “vaping product.”
